member.name: M:Fusee.Math.float4x4.TransformPD(Fusee.Math.float4x4,Fusee.Math.float3)
member.summary: Transforms a given 3D vector by a matrix using perspective division.
member.remarks: Before the matrix multiplication the 3D vector is extended to 4D by setting its W component to 1. After the matrix multiplication the resulting 4D vector is transformed to 3D by dividing X, Y, and Z by W. (perspective division).
member.returns: A new instance containing the result.
